definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
to wind around/to wrap round/to coil/tangle/to involve/to bother/to annoy

sentences.english: Finger rift, twisted in the love 。
Norrington: Our destinies have been entwined, Elizabeth…but never joined.
sentences.chinese: 我們命運交纏，伊麗莎白，但無緣結連理。

definition: to bare fangs and brandish claws (idiom); to make threatening gestures
(of a person) sad beyond words (idiom)/(of music, literature etc) poignant/very sentimental
variant of 戰慄|战栗[zhan4 li4]
lit. heads rubbing together (idiom)/fig. very close relationship
to be linked together/to be involved with/to collude/interconnection/involvement/collusion
to chat with a low voice
living spirit, living image (idiom); true to life/vivid and realistic
the still of the night (idiom)/late at night
to move/to shift/to move out of the way/to divert (money etc) to a different purpose
